Professional Summary

Dedicated and proactive Assistant Manager with one year of experience at Blue Lagoon Fish and Chips. Skilled in supervising staff, ensuring excellent customer service, and managing daily restaurant operations. Passionate about creating a welcoming environment and driving team performance to achieve business goals.



Core Competencies

Team Leadership & Staff Training

Restaurant Operations Management

Customer Service Excellence

Inventory & Stock Control

Health & Safety Compliance

Conflict Resolution

Scheduling & Payroll Management

Sales & Revenue Optimization



Professional Experience

Assistant Manager
Blue Lagoon Fish and Chips, [City, State] • September 1, 2024 – Present

Supervise and support a team of front-of-house and kitchen staff to maintain smooth daily operations.

Ensure high standards of food quality, cleanliness, and customer service, enhancing overall guest satisfaction.

Oversee inventory levels, order supplies, and reduce waste to control costs effectively.

Train and mentor new team members, fostering a positive and productive work environment.

Handle customer inquiries and resolve complaints promptly and professionally.

Assist in staff scheduling, payroll management, and compliance with health and safety regulations.

Collaborate with the manager to implement promotional activities and strategies to increase sales.



Education

Bachelor of [Degree, e.g., Hospitality Management or Business Administration]
[University Name], [City, State] • [Graduation Year]



Certifications

Food Safety & Hygiene Certification

First Aid & CPR Certification



Technical Skills

POS Systems

Inventory Management Software

Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)



Achievements

Recognized for significantly improving team efficiency and guest satisfaction scores within the first year.

Successfully reduced operational costs through improved inventory control and waste reduction strategies.

Full Stack Developer (Laravel / Angular) 
 
2/2 195 Deanston, Shawlands 
+44 7404 536622 
Glasgow, G41 3JT, Scotland 
waleed.mazhar0212@gmail.com  
Born 02/12/1993 
 
LinkedIn | Github 
My notice period is one week. 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
PHP (8 years of project experience) | Laravel (8) | JavaScript (8) | TypeScript (6) | Angular (6) | Vue.js (3) | 
Rest APIs (8) |  Microservices (6) | JQuery (8) | NodeJS (2) | ExpressJS (2) | WordPress (3) | Material UI (6) | 
HTML (8) | CSS/SASS (8) | Bootstrap (8) | MYSQL (8) | MariaDB (8) | MongoDB (4) | MSSQL(4) | 
POSTGRES (2) | Ebay/Amazon APIs (4) | AWS (Lambda, S3) (5) | Kubernetes (5) | Docker (5) | Git (8) | 
CI/CD Pipelines (8) | Agile Methodologies (8)  
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 
01/2021 – 09/2024 
Senior Full Stack Developer 
 
Histone Solutions, Islamabad, Pakistan 
Project: Seller Legend – a customizable Amazon analytics dashboard that 
speeds up time to insight and action for Amazon business used by 10k+ sellers. 
I’m leading an agile team of 5 developers using Laravel, Typescript and 
Angular 16 so the software pulls data directly from Amazon using Amazon 
APIs and reports, providing accurate, up-to-the-minute information on daily 
Amazon sales and other metrics. For that, I refactored/monitored 100+ reusable 
components from class to functional components, optimized 10+ APIs to boost 
the performance of the app. Most importantly, I built the supply chain feature 
which reduced client purchasing and warehouse transfer process time by 60%. 
Developed a new email notifications system using Angular and AWS S3 which 
eased communication with clients. Using AWS Lambda for database 
synchronization. I work on the overall supply chain management system. 
Responsible for writing clean code with industry best practices, conducting 
daily stand-ups, implementation of all the new features and resolving bugs.  
 
Technologies used: Laravel | PHP | JavaScript | TypeScript | Angular | CSS | 
JQuery | Material UI | ExpressJS | Ebay/Amazon APIs | Sequelize ORM | 
MYSQL | MariaDB | AWS Container | Docker | AWS Continuous Deployment 
Pipeline | CI/CD | Agile | Scrum | Trello | Github | Intercom. 
 
09/2019 – 12/2020 
Full Stack Engineer 
Softisans, Islamabad, Pakistan 
 Project: Melio Health - a US-based startup offering a cloud-based SaaS digital 
health platform that allows patients to record, manage and share symptoms with 
health care providers. I worked on that project from scratch using Laravel and 
Angular 14. Added features like live video conferencing using socket.io, Stripe 
integration and worked on the deployment with Digital Ocean. Tech used: 
Laravel | Angular | PHP | JavaScript | TypeScript | HTML | CSS | Bootstrap | Rest 
APIs | Git | Asana | Digital Ocean. 
 
08/2016 – 08/2019 
Laravel and Angular Developer 
Nested Logics, Islamabad, Pakistan 
 
Project: 360 Installers - A Pakistani startup offering a leading pay per install 
network for advertising monetization for bloggers used by 25k+ blogging 
websites with 5k+ clients. I worked individually on this project developing the 
backend and frontend from scratch using PHP, Laravel, Lumen, Angular. 
Developed 50+ reusable components and connected 40+ Rest APIs. The app has 
time period based reporting for ads in tabular and graphical form and allows users 
 
 
 
2 of 2 
to get payout using different payment gateways (Payoneer, PayPal and Bank 
Wire). 
 
Project: Riders - a car sharing app for the Thailand and Malaysian markets where 
users can offer or take rides after registering. I work in a team of 3 developing 
the project from scratch using Laravel. Admin side has full control over 
management of users, bookings and requests, graphical stats reports are also 
integrated for both user and admin side.  
 
Project: I was in charge of developing multiple modern, fully responsive 
management systems using Laravel, Angular, WordPress, HTML5, CSS3, Sass, 
Bootstrap for different multinational clients. Focused on structure design to 
produce end products that are cross-browser compatible & supported by all major 
browsers across devices. Implementation of RESTful APIs for different 
applications. Extensively used GIT for version controlling and regularly pushed 
the code to GitHub/Gitlab.  
 
Tech used: Laravel | PHP | Angular 2+ | TypeScript | JavaScript | JQuery | 
WordPress | HTML | CSS | Bootstrap | Node JS | Express JS | Material UI | Rest 
APIs | Git | Trello. 
 
EDUCATION 
 
09/2024 - today 
Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence  
 
University of the West of Scotland, Paisley, Scotland 
 
11/2012 - 08/2016 
Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering 
 
University of Engineering and Technology, Taxila, Pakistan 
 
LANGUAGE SKILLS 
 
English (C2) | Urdu (C2) | Punjabi (Mother Tongue) 
 
HOBBIES 
 
Hiking | Traveling | Cricket | Football
